title: Amazon Web Services Hit by Outage
sub_head: Company says it has resolved issues with cloud-software programs in its region covering Eastern part of U.S.
body:
Amazon.com Inc. grappled with an hourslong outage tied to its enormous cloud-computing operation that affected many businesses, forcing them to warn their customers about product disruptions
The service interruption that affected a wide swath of customers began early Wednesday and lasted throughout the day as Amazon Web Services, as the online retailing giantâ€™s cloud division is called, scrambled to fully restore functions. Amazon said early Thursday all services were back to normal operations.
Before...
